issue.message: By convention, the custom view (`BookmarksListItem`) and the declare-styleable (`TwoLineListItem`) should have the same name (various editor features rely on this convention)
By convention, the custom view (`StatusIndicatorView`) and the declare-styleable (`StatusIndicator`) should have the same name (various editor features rely on this convention)
